channel.title: Need walk thorough how to make server on laptop please (dont have a desktop)
channel.description:
hey,
can someone please run me through how to make a easy private server but a fun one....if you help me i can make you admin please!!!! i have aim (ask for s/n) or you can message me on here but please help me through it
(parts done)
1) made an account on no-ip 2)added host
thank you + 50k if you play reg rs2!!!!!
,thanks
